articles.description: A German study suggests COVID-19 may inflict long-term on male fertility, with sperm quality significantly impacted over a period of 60 days.
articles.content:
A German study suggests that the Chinese coronavirus may inflict long-term on male fertility, with sperm quality significantly impacted over a period of 60 days.
